Articles.Content:
hi wondering if you can help, 

im having some wiered problem with the telescopic hydraulic cylinder in ksp 1.10. and the breaking ground DLC, ive attached them to a ship im working on to make a canada arm type thing, 

and i cant get the hydraulic cylinders to extend, when i make a test piece and just have a robotic arm they extend and work perfectly, however when i take the same arm and put it on my ship,

the cylinders just wont extent, im using the target extension, all the other parts such as the rotations peice and hinges work fine its literally just the hydraulic cylinders. 

 

wondering if im doing something stupid or theres a bug or something, has anyone else had this problem? how did you overcome it? 

 

hope you can help 

thanks li

Tried rotating them 180 degrees before attaching them?

Some of the IR/breaking ground parts have wierd affinities.
Do you have mods? I have the exact problem but im pretty sure its caused by one of the mods I have
